column1: - Processing Time (Days): Time taken to process an order (difference between Ship Date and Order Date).
- Sales per Unit: Sales divided by Quantity for each order.
- Profit Margin (%): Profit as a percentage of Sales.
- High Discount Flag: A binary flag indicating whether a discount greater than 30% was applied.
- Region-Specific Profit: The average profit for each region.
- Order Day: The day of the week when the order was placed.
